Class SolarBody

  • java.lang.Object
    • Point
      • SolarBody
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Asteroid, Moon, Planet, Star

    public abstract class SolarBody
extends Point
    This abstract class contains the definitions of what makes a SolarBody. Extends the Point class.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SolarBody

        public SolarBody(java.lang.String n,
                 double dis,
                 double a,
                 double dia,
                 java.lang.String c)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        n - The Name of the SolarBody
        dis - The Distance of the Solar Body from the centre of the Universe.
        a - The orbital of the SolarBody.
        dia - The diameter of the SolarBody.
        c - The colour of this SolarBody, as a string. Case insentive.

        One of: BLACK, BLUE, CYAN, DARK_GRAY, GRAY, GREEN, LIGHT_GRAY, MAGENTA, ORANGE, PINK, RED, WHITE, YELLOW. Alternatively, a 24 bit hexadecimal string representation of an RGB colour is also accepted, e.g. "#FF0000"
